entry.title: About cryptocurrency, my trading strategy
entry.content:
Prerequisite

There are a large number of projects in the cryptocurrency circle, a large number of trading pairs, but carefully think about it, how many of them are really valuable?BTC, ETH, especially ETH, have real application scenarios, and for most of the trading pairs, in fact, they are worthless, so for their trading, I will not be trading in the name of value investment, but purely gaming. But as an independent trader with a small amount of capital, we will face a great deal of risk, some junk coins, immobile, soaring hundreds of points, plummeting hundreds of points, so the most important thing is to deal with the risks faced in trading, and declare war on the dog bank (refers to the institutions or people who can dog around the ups and downs)!

Choosing what to trade

My thought process is as follows:
Small funds follow the idea below to make your selection:

  1. Entry in the bull market: bear market capital growth is slow, and the bear market time is long, the entry point is difficult to find, the shock market is easy for you to stop loss
  2. choose the new issue of the trading pair: new species generally will not break the issue, usually with the bull market, relying on the market sentiment to follow the surge, which is the easiest way to let the funds grow, doubling is very simple, of course, as long as it is a transaction, there is certainly a risk, so we need to liquidate the game!
  3. bull market to choose junk coins, liquidation of long-term short: Whenever the bull market market, a large number of junk coins will soar, such as a few dollars to dozens of dollars, for this kind of coins, we can be its long-term short, there will always be a time, it will return to the value of the choice of coins, you need to understand the background, to confirm that its nature really does not have any value, it is a purely financial game. At this point, we are shorting at a high level, of course, they may continue to soar, but to believe that his growth space is not much, so here we must be light leverage, must not be heavy positions, remain patient!

A large amount of money can follow the following ideas:

  1. the basic idea and the above consistent
  2. Bear market buy value coins: buy BTC, ETH, etc. at a cheap price

Be sure to have your own thinking about each currency and the meaning behind its growth

Fighting Financial Institutions to the End

Some examples

  • people:Organizations are disbanded and so fragile? But whenever there’s a US presidential election, there’s always a ticker, it’s just taking its name and hyping it up.
  • ORDI:The first token created using the BRC-20 replaceable token standard, so what? Can’t do it without you? What’s your advantage? What do you have that other tokens don’t?

I’ve been short from 84usdt and plan to hold until 25usdt then close the position

  • TURBO:This one is even funnier, with a GPT-4 challenge: create meme tokens with a budget of only $69. Tell me, what’s the point? Are you worth hundreds of millions of dollars in market cap right now with $69? It’s just pure money gaming, and in the end it’s all about harvesting.

……..

There are so many examples that you need to explore on your own, however, when making trades, it is important to control risk, remain patient, and most importantly, be patient, and match patience with the funding agencies.

entry.title: Trend Pattern Profiler Indicator
entry.content:
Intoducion Trend Pattern Profiler Indicator

In the ever-shifting landscape of forex trading, possessing a dependable instrument can be the key determinant between achieving success and facing defeat. A tool that has recently been capturing the attention of traders is the Trend Pattern Profiler Indicator. Within this exhaustive examination, we scrutinize the subtleties of this particular indicator, discussing its characteristics, capabilities, and the possible benefits and drawbacks it may offer.

Understanding the Basics

Fundamentally, the Trend Pattern Profiler Indicator is engineered to detect areas of peak trading volume within the market that may indicate an impending trend reversal. It functions on the assumption that prices adhere to specific patterns, and the indicator is adept at identifying pivotal levels, referred to as the first impulse level (RFI). These RFIs are essential regions where notable market transactions take place, thus impacting subsequent trading choices.

Technical Specifications

Version: 4.5
Year of issue: 2024
Working pairs: Any
Recommended timeframe: *Any*
Minimum Deposit: $300
Average of account: 1:30 To 1:1000

Trend Pattern Profiler Indicator Settings

Features and Functions

The indicator provides a wide array of capabilities designed to equip traders with valuable and practical information:

  • Accurate Timing for Trades: With the detection of RFIs, the indicator enables traders to pinpoint the best moments to enter the market, either in the direction of or against the current trend, with a success rate exceeding 90%. It also assists in establishing precise exit points or profit objectives across a range of timeframes.
  • Analysis Across Timeframes: Utilizing the Multitimeframe (MTF) feature, traders can integrate RFIs from larger timeframes, which enriches the analytical depth and the decision-making framework.
  • Automatic Triggers and Notifications: The indicator comes with automatic activation of certain templates like RETEST and BROKEN, which initiate alerts to encourage prompt responses. This functionality simplifies the trading workflow by minimizing the need for manual oversight.

Trading Strategies

The Trend Pattern Profiler Indicator presents two key trading templates: RETEST and BROKEN, each equipped with set conditions and signals to direct trading choices:

  • RETEST Template: Concentrating on recognizing price retracements to the RFI level, this template indicates possible trend reversals. Traders are advised to seek out particular conditions on shorter timeframes, like deceptive breakouts and shifts in trend, to confirm entry points.
  • BROKEN Template: Unlike the RETEST, the BROKEN template spots situations where the market does not reverse at the RFI level, signifying the ongoing trend. It offers explicit instructions for entry points and profit objectives, complemented by risk management tactics.

Advantages and Disadvantages

Although the Trend Pattern Profiler Indicator provides numerous advantages, such as accurate market evaluation and automated functionalities, it is crucial to weigh possible limitations:

Advantages:

  • High Accuracy in Trading: The indicator prides itself on a hit rate above 90% in pinpointing entry and exit points, granting traders a significant advantage in the market.
  • Efficient Trade Execution: Thanks to its automated triggers and notifications, the indicator allows traders to carry out trades with greater speed, reducing the likelihood of delays and oversight of opportunities.
  • Wide Applicability: The flexibility of the indicator makes it suitable for use with multiple currency pairs and timeframes, accommodating a broad spectrum of trading approaches and individual preferences.

Disadvantages:

  • Acquisition of Proficiency: Gaining a deep understanding of the indicator’s complexities and its related templates could demand considerable time and dedication, particularly for those new to trading.
  • Dependence on Automated Systems: Although automation can boost the efficiency of trading processes, an overreliance on automated indicators without grasping the fundamental market mechanisms might result in less than ideal decisions.
  • Market Turbulence: Similar to all trading instruments, the indicator could face constraints during times of extreme market volatility or unforeseen shifts, highlighting the need for flexibility and robust risk management strategies.

Conclusion

The Trend Pattern Profiler Indicator stands as a formidable assistant for traders looking to maneuver through the intricate dynamics of the forex market. Its comprehensive features, automatic capabilities, and adaptable trading strategies render it an invaluable component of a trader’s arsenal. Nonetheless, it is essential to adopt a well-rounded view of its application, recognizing its advantages and constraints. By employing this indicator with discernment and integrating it with solid trading practices, traders can optimize its effectiveness to reach their monetary objectives within the forex sphere. Keep an eye out for further revelations on how the Trend Pattern Profiler Indicator can transform your trading experience! Should you have inquiries or seek additional information, please feel free to reach out to us**!**

Download Trend Pattern Profiler Indicator

entry.title: MT5 Scalping EA
entry.content:
MT5 Scalping EA Review

MT5 Scalping EA is designed to identify the best opportunities for short-term trades in volatile currency markets by employing a scalping technique. This advisor was developed by Rp4000 and has been provided to us for use.

Guidance for using the MT5 Scalping EA:

  • A minimum account balance of $100 is necessary.
  • The EA is preset to operate on the H1 Timeframe with the EURUSD Currency Pair by default.
  • It is adaptable and can be used with any currency pair and timeframe.

MT5 Scalping EA Setting

This superior scalping EA for the MT5 platform is noteworthy for its ability to generate profits even with minimal initial investments and maintains a low maximum drawdown during trading. It refrains from utilizing high-risk trading tactics such as grid or martingale systems, ensuring that all trades are safeguarded by take profit and stop loss orders.

The EA offers flexibility in trading size, either through a fixed lot size or an automatic lot size adjustment that increases the trade volume dynamically. It is capable of remaining inactive for extended periods, engaging in only 2 to 5 transactions per week, and it operates by executing a single trade at a time in the market.

The RoyalPrince Scalper EA has demonstrated resilience through a series of rigorous monthly stress tests, showing an outstanding profit-to-drawdown ratio. It has also been thoroughly backtested using extensive historical data, which has validated its low maximum drawdown percentage. This feature makes it viable for use with a modest initial capital outlay.

While the EA’s default settings target a conservative monthly profit margin of approximately 4-8%, these settings ensure a stable return with minimal drawdown.

Scalping Ea mt5 Download

entry.title: Fx Evolution Stratigie EA
entry.content:
Fx Evolution Stratigie EA MT5 Description

This organic assessment aims to approximate a feasible manual trade approach.
The EA’s design and methodology enable it to manage your account effectively, without encountering significant difficulties.
It is a master advisor for long-term vision, not a short-term trader.
The EA can hold back for more than seven days, patiently waiting for the perfect opportunity.
However, it can maintain open positions for several days or weeks to enhance drawdown (DD) and profits.
The profit aspect of this ecological assessment is excellent, as is its recovery and risk element.

This system integrates over eight indicators and filters.
The EA is multidisciplinary, operating simultaneously on 28 pairs.
It functions with all brokers, regardless of quote, execution speed, fees, spread, etc.

Benefits include:

  • Trading on 28 pairs concurrently
  • No need for any adjustments (the set files are provided)
  • Operates in both bullish and bearish markets
  • It remains unexposed to market conditions
  • It enhances profits and limits drawdown due to numerous markers and options: Trailing Stop Loss, indicator-based closing, by Stop Loss, hourly, by profit, by initial distance, etc.
  • An innovative news filter with pre and post schedules for news events, as well as independent hours for key news like FOMC, ECB, Fed…
    Since the update, there is also a specific news filter for nighttime news.
  • Multiple capital safeguards, based on percentage, equity, etc.

entry.title: Multi TimeFrame EA
entry.content:
Multi TimeFrame EA

Are you prepared to transform your forex trading journey? Discover the Multi TimeFrame EA, an innovative solution poised to significantly elevate your trading capabilities. Built upon the robust legacy of the renowned Goldtrade Pro, this Expert Advisor (EA) is meticulously crafted to function flawlessly across various timeframes at once, delivering unmatched adaptability and productivity.

This state-of-the-art EA serves as a gateway to enhanced trading tactics and exceptional outcomes, catering to both the experienced trader seeking to refine their strategies and the novice looking to establish a strong foundation in the dynamic world of forex trading. By harnessing the power of the Multi TimeFrame EA, traders can expect a quantum leap in their trading performance and efficiency.

Optimized Trading with Multi TimeFrame EA

  • Seamless Multi-Timeframe Operation: Experience the efficiency of an EA that works effortlessly across different timeframes, providing a comprehensive view of market movements.
  • Enhanced Flexibility: Tailor your trading approach to suit your style with the flexibility offered by the Multi TimeFrame EA.
  • Foundation of Success: Benefit from the proven success of Goldtrade Pro, ensuring a solid base for your trading endeavors.
  • Suitable for All Traders: Whether you’re a forex veteran or just beginning your trading adventure, the Multi TimeFrame EA is designed to meet your needs.

Unveiling the Power Behind Multi TimeFrame EA

The Multi TF EA is a trading tool with a complex algorithm at its heart. This algorithm uses various confirmation techniques to pinpoint the best times to enter the market. It combines multiple trading strategies with stringent risk management measures to provide a comprehensive trading approach. This ensures that risks are minimized while maximizing the potential for profits. The EA is particularly adept at trading breakouts of critical support and resistance levels, which is especially important in the volatile gold market. It is designed to perform well in fluctuating market conditions.

Technical Specifications

  • Version: 1.5
  • Year of issue: 2024
  • Working pairs: XAUUSD
  • Recommended timeframe: MTF
  • Minimum Deposit: $500
  • Average of account: 1:30 To 1:1000

Multi TimeFrame EA Settings

Advantages of Multi TimeFrame EA

  1. Dynamic Adjustment: The EA features an adaptive system that modifies trade frequency and lot sizes in response to your account balance and your specified risk appetite, ensuring that it performs optimally in different market scenarios.
  2. Risk Management: The EA is equipped with inbuilt stop-loss and take-profit features, along with the option for trailing stop-loss and take-profit, which work to reduce potential risks and safeguard your investment against unfavorable market shifts.
  3. Consistency and Dependability: The Multi TimeFrame EA has been thoroughly backtested and stress-tested, demonstrating its strength and stability. It has shown consistent growth and managed drawdowns effectively over long-term use.
  4. Ease of Use: The EA is designed for easy installation and setup, suitable for traders regardless of their experience level. Its user-friendly interface offers adjustable parameters, allowing users to tailor the EA to their personal trading preferences and styles.
  5. Established Success: Created by a seasoned team with more than a decade of expertise in automated trading systems, the Multi TimeFrame EA is a testament to the developers’ dedication to integrity, openness, and the effectiveness of trading operations.

Disadvantages of Multi TimeFrame EA

  1. Market Sensitivity: The EA is crafted to thrive in conditions characterized by market volatility, yet its performance could be less pronounced during times of calm or when the market undergoes unforeseen changes.
  2. Adaptation Period: There might be an initial phase where users, especially those unfamiliar with automated trading systems, need to spend some time getting accustomed to the EA’s settings and features.

Optimizing Your Trading Experience

To optimally utilize the capabilities of the Multi TimeFrame, it’s crucial to delve into its primary attributes and settings:

  1. Trading Frequency: Opt for a trading frequency that aligns with your strategy, ranging from cautious to bold, or enable the EA to set the frequency automatically by referencing your account configuration.
  2. Maximum Drawdown Threshold: Establish the highest acceptable drawdown percentage to align the risk management with your personal risk appetite.
  3. Configuration: Deploy the EA on your chosen chart, designate XAUUSD as your trading pair, and adjust settings like trading frequency and maximum drawdown to match your trading objectives.
  4. Backtesting: Make the most of the Multi TimeFrame EA’s comprehensive backtesting features to assess its performance across different market scenarios and parameter configurations.
  5. Customizable Parameters: Get acquainted with the wide array of parameters that can be tailored to your needs, such as methods for calculating lot size, caps on daily drawdown, and equity-influenced calculations.

Multi TimeFrame EA Results

In conclusion

The Multi TimeFrame EA ushers in a new era in forex trading, combining cutting-edge technology with dependability and flexibility. Its sophisticated capabilities, solid performance track record, and accessible design grant traders the tools to confidently and accurately maneuver through the intricacies of the forex market. If you aim to refine your trading tactics, reduce exposure to risk, or enhance your overall trading approach, the Multi TimeFrame EA stands as your top-tier partner in achieving forex trading triumphs. Embrace the forefront of trading now and take your trading endeavors to new heights with the Multi TimeFrame EA.

entry.title: Forex Wiki Green EA
entry.content:
Forex Wiki Green EA Introduction

Hello,

As a seasoned group of Forex traders with extensive experience spanning over ten years, we are well-versed in the intricacies and hurdles inherent to the foreign exchange market. Our team has been keeping a close watch on the software market trends for more than a decade, and we are committed to sharing new Forex tools with our Forex Wiki community to enhance their understanding of these tools’ functionalities.

Our research and development lab has meticulously examined numerous trading strategies. We owe our gratitude to our site’s administrator, a Doctor of Artificial Intelligence, whose expertise has propelled our development efforts to new heights. We have successfully achieved a remarkable 91% accuracy rate in pinpointing entry points, marking a significant advancement in our field.

However, the complexity of Forex trading extends beyond merely identifying entry points. The market’s swift and often unpredictable movements can swiftly alter trends, complicating the task of setting fixed Take Profit (TP) and Stop Loss (SL) levels.

This is where our pioneering approach, integrating AI-based martingale management, steps in. We have crafted an advanced training system that employs a novel martingale technique, diverging from the traditional method that solely relies on multiplication. Our system is refined with over 100 real-world parameters derived directly from the market to adeptly handle the martingale process.

Our AI-driven martingale management system is a revolutionary tool in the Forex trading landscape. It facilitates efficient order management and mitigates the risks inherent in conventional martingale strategies. By harnessing this system, we can optimize our trading strategies and amplify our earnings.

For those who aspire to elevate their Forex trading prowess, we highly recommend exploring our AI-based martingale management system. Reach out to us now to discover how this innovative system can assist you in realizing your Forex trading ambitions.

Forex Wiki Green EA Review

The Forex Wiki Green EA is an autonomous, trend-following trading system that is tailored for the EURUSD currency pair, operating within the H1 Time Frame.

This system is underpinned by a sophisticated and advanced martingale approach, which entails escalating the trade size subsequent to a loss, with the aim of recouping the losses and securing a profit. Although this tactic has the potential to result in substantial drawdowns, the EA has demonstrated its capability to yield reliable profits over an extended period.

Technical Specifications

  • **Version: **1.36
  • Year of issue: 2024
  • Working pairs: EURUSD
  • Recommended timeframe: H1
  • Minimum Deposit: !
  • Average of account: 1:30 To 1:1000

In order to use this EA, a minimum balance of $3000 is required for leverage 1:500, $4000 for leverage 1:200, and $5000 for leverage 1:100.

Best Brokers List

Forex Wiki Green EA Strategy

The EA deploys a strategy that places trades in alignment with the prevailing market trend, initiating orders only after a price correction has taken place. Should the price correction move counter to the market trend, the EA will activate its martingale strategy to expedite the attainment of the profit target.

Should the situation arise where an existing order has not achieved the profit target and there is a shift in the market trend, the EA will engage in hedging as a precautionary measure to safeguard the investment. Upon reaching the profit target for both purchase and sale orders, the EA will terminate all orders. Moreover, if all active orders incur a loss reaching up to 5% of the equity, the EA will close all orders to ensure the preservation of funds. Subsequently, the EA will seek out new opportunities and execute orders at the next feasible juncture.

Forex Wiki Green EA Setting

The EA includes various settings and parameters for lot size, risk, profit targets, and hidden stop loss, as well as buttons for closing orders and filter trades.

One of the unique features of Forex Wiki Green EA is the inclusion of more than 10 indicators inside, which are commonly used in technical analysis to identify trends and support/resistance levels.

These indicators enable the EA to follow the market trend and identify opportunities for profitable trades.

The EA places an order according to the direction of the market trend and places additional positions on floating negative conditions to accelerate reaching the profit target. If the profit target has not been reached and the market trend has changed, the EA will start opening trades in the opposite direction and will close all trades when the profit target has been reached.

Forex Wiki Green EA Results

The training dataset used to develop this EA contains only historical data of the EURUSD pair.

To validate the EA, we tried a lot of settings in EURUSD H1, and it was not too complicated, and it was quick to achieve the results below when tested between 2021 and 2023.

To ensure the real performance of this robot, it has been deployed for 3 years from the end of 2020 until now. The results speak for themselves, and we are confident in the effectiveness of this trading Robot

Conclusion

The Forex Wiki Green EA stands out as a dependable and potent automated trading solution, designed to assist traders in attaining lucrative outcomes within the forex market. Boasting a range of customizable options and distinctive attributes, this trading robot equips traders with the adaptability and command essential for thriving in this fiercely competitive field. Despite the potential for significant drawdowns associated with the martingale strategy, the EA has consistently proven its mettle in delivering steady profits over an extended period.

Forex Wiki Green EA Download

click to download
